description: Common UX issues with remediation guidance

issues.title: Missing alt text on images
issues.description: Images lack alternative text for screen readers
issues.remediation: Add descriptive alt text to all meaningful images. Use alt="" for decorative images.

issues.title: Insufficient color contrast
issues.description: Text does not meet minimum contrast ratio requirements
issues.remediation: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast for normal text, 3:1 for large text. Use scripts/check_contrast.py to verify.
issues.example_good: color: #595959 on white background (7:1)

issues.title: Keyboard trap
issues.description: User cannot navigate away from element using keyboard
issues.remediation: Ensure all interactive elements can be exited via Tab or Escape. Test modal focus traps.
issues.example_bad: Modal with no escape key handler
issues.example_good: Modal closes on Escape, Tab cycles within modal, focus returns on close

issues.title: Focus indicator not visible
issues.description: Keyboard focus state is not visible or removed
issues.remediation: Never use outline: none without replacement. Use :focus-visible for keyboard-only focus.
issues.example_good: :focus-visible { outline: 3px solid #005fcc; outline-offset: 2px; }

issues.title: Form inputs missing labels
issues.description: Form fields lack associated labels
issues.remediation: Use <label for="id"> or aria-labelledby to associate labels with inputs.
issues.example_good: <label for="email">Email</label><input id="email" type="email">

issues.title: Touch target too small
issues.description: Interactive elements smaller than minimum 24x24px (WCAG 2.2)
issues.remediation: Ensure all interactive elements are at least 24x24px (AA) or 44x44px (AAA).
issues.example_good: Icon button at 44x44px with padding extending touch area

issues.title: No loading indicator
issues.description: Long operations (>300ms) provide no visual feedback
issues.remediation: Add spinner for 300ms-1s operations, skeleton for 1-3s, progress bar for >3s.
issues.example_bad: Button with no state change during API call
issues.example_good: Button shows spinner and disabled state during submission

issues.title: No undo for destructive action
issues.description: Destructive actions cannot be undone
issues.remediation: Implement soft-delete with undo option, or confirmation dialog before permanent deletion.
issues.example_good: Delete shows 'Item deleted. Undo?' toast for 5 seconds

issues.title: No confirmation for destructive action
issues.description: High-risk actions proceed without user confirmation
issues.remediation: Add confirmation dialog for delete, cancel subscription, or other irreversible actions.
issues.example_good: Confirmation modal: 'Are you sure? This cannot be undone.'

issues.title: Error message not actionable
issues.description: Error messages don't explain how to fix the problem
issues.remediation: Provide specific, actionable error messages that tell users how to resolve the issue.
issues.example_good: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., name@example.com)

issues.title: Excessive steps in flow
issues.description: Primary task requires too many clicks/steps
issues.remediation: Reduce click count: 1-2 for primary actions, 2-3 for common tasks. Combine screens where possible.

issues.title: High cognitive load
issues.description: Too many options, fields, or decisions presented at once
issues.remediation: Apply 7Â±2 rule: max 7 items in lists/menus. Use progressive disclosure and smart defaults.
issues.example_good: Multi-step form with 3-5 fields per step

issues.title: User data lost on error
issues.description: Form submission error clears user input
issues.remediation: Preserve form data on validation errors. Store in session/local storage for long forms.
issues.example_bad: Server error reloads page with empty form
issues.example_good: Error shown inline, all fields retain values

issues.title: Horizontal scrolling on mobile
issues.description: Content requires horizontal scrolling at 320px viewport
issues.remediation: Ensure content reflows at 320px without horizontal scroll. Use responsive images and flexible grids.
issues.example_good: Responsive table with horizontal scroll on table only, or card layout on mobile

issues.title: Content only accessible on hover
issues.description: Information or actions only appear on mouse hover
issues.remediation: Ensure hover content is also accessible via touch (tap), keyboard (focus), or is always visible.
issues.example_bad: Delete button only visible on row hover
issues.example_good: Delete button always visible, or accessible via context menu / swipe

issues.title: Animations ignore prefers-reduced-motion
issues.description: Animations play regardless of user's motion preference
issues.remediation: Wrap animations in @media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference) or provide toggle.
issues.example_good: @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) { *, *::before, *::after { animation-duration: 0.01ms !important; } }

issues.title: Confirm-shaming in UI copy
issues.description: Rejection options use guilt-inducing language
issues.remediation: Use neutral language for rejection options. 'No thanks' instead of 'No, I don't want to save money'.
issues.example_bad: No thanks, I prefer to stay uninformed
issues.example_good: No thanks

issues.title: Hidden costs in checkout
issues.description: Fees or costs revealed late in purchase flow
issues.remediation: Show all costs (shipping, taxes, fees) as early as possible, ideally before checkout begins.
issues.example_bad: Service fee appears only at final checkout step
issues.example_good: Total with all fees shown on product page

issues.title: Unequal consent buttons
issues.description: Accept button is more prominent than Reject
issues.remediation: Give Accept and Reject equal visual prominence (size, color, position).
issues.example_bad: Large blue 'Accept All', tiny gray 'Manage preferences'
issues.example_good: Same-sized buttons: [Reject All] [Accept All]

issues.title: Difficult cancellation (roach motel)
issues.description: Signing up is easy but cancellation is hidden or complicated
issues.remediation: Make cancellation as easy as signup. Self-service cancellation in account settings.
issues.example_bad: Requires phone call to cancel subscription
issues.example_good: Cancel button in account settings with confirmation

issues.title: Technical jargon without explanation
issues.description: UI uses technical terms without context or definition
issues.remediation: Replace jargon with plain language, or provide inline explanation/tooltip on first use.
issues.example_good: You've made too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.

issues.title: Ambiguous link text
issues.description: Links use 'click here' or 'read more' without context
issues.remediation: Make link text descriptive of destination. 'View pricing details' instead of 'click here'.
issues.example_good: View our pricing details.

issues.title: Hardcoded values instead of tokens
issues.description: Styles use raw values instead of design system tokens
issues.remediation: Replace hardcoded values with design tokens: var(--color-primary), var(--space-4), etc.
issues.example_good: color: var(--color-primary); padding: var(--space-4);

issues.title: AI involvement not disclosed
issues.description: Users are not informed that AI is generating or influencing content
issues.remediation: Clearly label AI-generated content. 'Generated by AI' badge or disclosure.
issues.example_good: Summary (Generated by AI) with clear badge

issues.title: Cannot override AI decision
issues.description: User cannot reject or modify AI suggestions/decisions
issues.remediation: Provide 'Ignore' or 'Edit' options for AI outputs. Never force AI decisions without human override.
issues.example_bad: AI auto-applies changes with no review
issues.example_good: AI suggests changes, user can Accept, Edit, or Reject

critical.description: Blocks task completion or violates regulations
